subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda allowed just one earned run over seven and two-thirds innings, and Brian Roberts broke a 3-3 tie with a homer in the ninth to salvage a win in Anaheim.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda allowed just one earned run over seven and two-thirds innings, and Brian Roberts broke a 3-3 tie with a homer in the ninth to salvage a win in Anaheim.
